modes.label: Guided Assessment
modes.description: Full wizard experience with AI insights enabled.

risks.title: Unauthorized Wire Transfer
risks.description: External actors submit fraudulent wire requests through call centers or compromised credentials.
risks.aiSummary: Pattern drift detected in dual-approval sequences; recommend strengthening detective analytics.

risks.title: Deepfake Voice Authorization
risks.description: Synthetic voice attempts bypass verbal authentication steps during wire callbacks.
risks.aiSummary: AI voiceprints show elevated match variance; deploy challenge-response scripts.

risks.title: Real-time Payment Reversal Risk
risks.description: Insufficient reversal windows for real-time rails increase loss exposure.
risks.aiSummary: Average reversal time exceeds policy by 18 minutes; tighten escalation triggers.

risks.title: Fraud Detection Failure
risks.description: Scenario coverage gaps reduce anomaly detection reliability for wire activity.
risks.aiSummary: Scenario library coverage at 74%; expand AI models to include cross-border typologies.

controls.title: Dual Authentication Control
controls.description: Requires two independent approvals for all high-value wire transfers.

controls.title: Out-of-Band Call Back
controls.description: Performs voice callback verification using pre-registered contacts.

controls.title: Reversal Escalation Runbook
controls.description: Escalates real-time payment reversals within defined SLA windows.

controls.title: Real-time Wire Monitoring
controls.description: Machine learning analytics identify anomalous wire requests in-flight.

controls.title: Agent Deepfake Playbook
controls.description: Coaches frontline staff on deepfake red flags and challenge questions.

controls.title: Model Validation Program
controls.description: Quarterly validation of AI detection models against new typologies.

aiHighlights.message: Residual risk remains high because detective coverage lags industry peers by 2 controls.
aiHighlights.nextBestAction: Map call-back-protocol control to all high-value products.

aiHighlights.message: Voice biometric drift detected; challenge-response compliance dropped to 82%.
aiHighlights.nextBestAction: Roll out agent-training refresher with new trigger phrases.

aiHighlights.message: Escalation SLA variance exceeds policy by 14 minutes.
aiHighlights.nextBestAction: Implement reversal-escalation automation in the next sprint.

strategies.title: Strengthen Detective Controls
strategies.description: Deploy analytics and manual detective controls to close audit-documented gaps.

strategies.title: Modernize Voice Authentication
strategies.description: Introduce adaptive challenge prompts and biometric drift monitoring.

strategies.title: Automate Reversal SLAs
strategies.description: Trigger automatic escalation if reversal approval exceeds 5 minutes.
